snippet: EHRENHAUS--Roslyn (Razele bat Malka). Born October 22, 1925, in Philadelphia, PA, passed away from a brief illness on May 1, 2016. Joined in heaven with her beloved Philip Ehrenhaus. Will be surely missed by Stewart and Isobel Ehrenhaus, Henry and Lisa Rubin and all her grandchildren. 1/3
lead_paragraph: EHRENHAUS--Roslyn (Razele bat Malka). Born October 22, 1925, in Philadelphia, PA, passed away from a brief illness on May 1, 2016. Joined in heaven with her beloved Philip Ehrenhaus. Will be surely missed by Stewart and Isobel Ehrenhaus, Henry and Lisa Rubin and all her grandchildren. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EHRENHAUS, ROSLYN (RAZELE BAT MALKA)
